lectures.note: Welcome to visit all of the companies and organisations on the fair!

lectures.topic: From Curiosity to Impact: A Personal Journey Through Generative AI and Cybersecurity
lectures.speaker: Vahid Zohali, Managing Director of IBM Sweden
lectures.note: Through an inspiring and personal journey in the world of IT, Vahid shares his path from early technical curiosity to leading roles within a global tech organization. He highlights the lessons, challenges, and key decisions that have shaped his perspective on innovation, leadership, generative AI, and cybersecurity. Generative AI is one of the most significant technological shifts of our time and is transforming how we work, lead, and protect digital systems. This lecture explores how generative AI and cybersecurity interact, covering innovation, risks, responsibility, and the future of digital security.
Foo Bar, located on the second floor of DSV, opens! We invite you to share a bite, mingle and unwind after the fair!
